name: Trade Away
description:
A clicker game made for the Ludum Dare 44.

How to play:

  • Earn your freedom by making money and "using" human beings.

Controls:

Action
DescriptionLeft Click
Use that to move like in a point and click.
Right Click + move the mouse
Rotate the camera.

Team:

  • Alicia MAGISTRELLO - Game Art
  • Clément DURANTI - Programming / Integration / Game Design
